name: Deja
description: A Direct to Consumer Brand offering natural products and holistic lifestyle advice based on the ancient science of Ayurveda

jobs.title: MARKETING INTERN
jobs.description:
JOB SUMMARY
Deja is looking for a marketing intern to help with day to day marketing activities across multiple channels.

We are in the early stages, about to launch our first product.  You will have a very hands-on experience, get exposure to all different parts of the business, and gain a lot of valuable early-stage startup experience working very closely with the founding team.

This role is a part-time, flexible hours internship that would require ~15 hours/week time commitment. The length of the internship is two months, with an opportunity to convert to a permanent position. 
The role will be based in London.

RESPONSIBILITIES
**Social Media**
* 		Helping to come up with creative ideas for our Instagram
* 		Helping to find/design on-brand images
* 		Community management (Instagram & Facebook)
* 		Working with our copywriter to create captions for posts
* 		Scheduling posts and stories

**Content**
* 		Sourcing content; from Ayurvedic tips to helping to educate people about Ayurveda
* 		Helping to create creative content e.g. images, graphics, GIFs, etc

**Emails & CRM**
* 		Setting up email campaigns on Mailchimp
* 		Designing/setting up email templates
* 		Helping with the content calendar and email strategy

**Other**
* 		Help with coordinating events
* 		Assisting with product sales
* 		Helping put together presentations
* 		Other admin

SKILLS/REQUIREMENTS
**Essential:**
* 		You will have a good creative eye; what images and colours look good together
* 		Excellent written English
* 		Creative thinker; coming up with new ways to communicate our message and engage our community
* 		Good communication skills
* 		A quick learner
* 		A team player

**Would be a bonus:**
* 		A creative degree/qualification
* 		Experience using In Design/Photoshop or similar
* 		Experience using Powerpoint
* 		A passion for the wellness/alternative medicine space!

If this sounds like you please email below with CV and short intro;
Sara Herandi: sara@deja.life

Thanks for your interest!
